author: sppatel
msg: GERONIMODEVTOOLS-52 provide own launchable adapter to launch web resources

author: gnodet
msg: SM-525: Enhancement to ValidateComponent to implement a complete and flexible error handling scheme for schema validation

author: djd
msg: DERBY-766 (partial) Modify the approach in the split expressions method of CodeChunk to only identify
self-contained chunks of byte code from a limited set of instructions. Thus this is a "fail-safe" approach,
rather than trying to catch all the opcodes that would make a set of byte code not self-contained.
Incremental development, method is still not called and does not perform any splits yet,
I test it with calls from BCMethod and a reduced split threshold (e.g. split if the method
is ~3k big instead of the limit of 64k).

author: jdcasey
msg: Adding ability to specify a single POM to build as an override to the scanning behavior.
